title: 目指せ！頼れるお姉ちゃん

text_block_list.text: While walking with Matikanetannhauser, an unexpected person's voice caught my ear.
Mmm... immature!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Huh? That voice...?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: It's the director after all! What's wrong~, being here alone like this?

text_block_list.name: Yayoi Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Today is a rare private day... so I extended my steps to the amusement park, but—

text_block_list.name: Yayoi Akikawa
text_block_list.text: I forgot! There are many attractions you can't ride without a guardian accompanying you!

text_block_list.name: Yayoi Akikawa
text_block_list.text: I've been building up ideas in preparation for today, yet to retreat empty-handed... how regrettable!!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Mmm... Trainer! This is the time for our rescue duo to step in!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Director! Don't worry! You have a guardian right here, don't you!

text_block_list.name: Yayoi Akikawa
text_block_list.text: What!? You two will accompany me!?

text_block_list.name: Yayoi Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Many thanks! I'll gratefully accept your kindness! Now, let's challenge the amusement park attractions again!

text_block_list.name: Yayoi Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Ohh, with all my feelings! Isn't the very scene I dreamed of spreading out before my eyes!

text_block_list.name: Yayoi Akikawa
text_block_list.text: I can't stand this! First... the standard move! Let's head straight for the roller coaster!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Mufufu. Somehow, seeing you like this, the Director seems like a normal child too.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
It reminds me of my little brother when he was young.
...Hmm.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...I've decided! For today, I'll be the Director's big sister!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: You always take care of us! I'll look after you as much as possible so you can enjoy yourself to the fullest, big sister Machitan!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: No problem! I've been a big sister ever since my brother was born, so I'm a veteran!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Director, Director! Which ride do you want to go on next?

text_block_list.name: Yayoi Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Hmm! Since we've had gentle attractions like the Ferris wheel and teacups,
I plan to challenge the free fall next!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Understood! Then, big sis... I'll be your guide~! I think it's left from here——

text_block_list.name: Yayoi Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Doubt! According to the map over there, isn't the freefall on the right route?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Huh? ...Oh, you're right.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ——Whoa! Look over there! It's a special carrot soft serve! You want some, right!? Director!

text_block_list.name: Yayoi Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Hmm, intriguing! The only way is to taste it!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Hehehe, I knew it, I knew it! Then, I'll go buy it for you!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...Wait, whoa~!

text_block_list.name: Yayoi Akikawa
text_block_list.text: A fall!? ...Nosebleed! Use this tissue immediately!

text_block_list.name: Yayoi Akikawa
text_block_list.text: ——Satisfied! No, thanks to you two, it's been a truly wonderful day off!

text_block_list.name: Yayoi Akikawa
text_block_list.text: By the way... Tannhauser! Truly, being energetic and cheerful is splendid! I had fun thanks to you!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Tehehe... Not that much.

text_block_list.name: Yayoi Akikawa
text_block_list.text: But... I'm a little worried! Please be careful and lead a healthy school life!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Yes~!

text_block_list.name: Yayoi Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Well then, farewell! I'll never forget today's memories!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...Wait, huh!? I'm being genuinely worried about!?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Th-that can't be...! All day today, I was supposed to be the Director's reliable big sis...!
choice_data_list: You were doing great as a big sis
You were doing great as a big sis

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Phew... That's right! There's no way I, with over a decade of big sis experience, couldn't be a big sis... tehehe.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Huh!?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Wh-which is it~! Come on~!
Becoming a 'reliable big sis' seems like it's still a ways off. ...Though maybe a 'natural airhead big sis' is another story.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Whaaat!? No way~!?
M-My pride as an active older sister...!
choice_data_list: But the Director was enjoying it
But the Director was enjoying it

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ! That's right! That's what matters most!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
I had a lot of fun too.
I hope we get another chance to play together as a trio~.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: And when that time comes... I'll show you I can be a reliable older sister!
